n=int(input())
s=set()
for i in range(n):
	x,d =map(int,input().split())
	if (x+d,-d) in s:
		print('YES')
		return
	s.add((x, d))
print('NO')

def fun(t):
    s=[]
    a=[]
    b=[]
    for _ in range(t):
        x,y=list(map(int,input().split()))
        s.append(x+y)
        a.append(x)
        b.append(y)
    
    for i in range(t):
        if(s[i] in a):
            yy=a.index(s[i])
            xx=a[yy]+b[yy]
            if(xx==a[i]):
                return "YES"
    return "NO"
        
t=int(input())
print(fun(t))
